mapper.select: SELECT T.TASK_ACTIVITY_ID , T.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID FROM ( SELECT B.TASK_ACTIVITY_ID , A.START_TIME , A.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY B.TASK_ACTIVITY_ID ORDER BY A.START_TIME) AS RN FROM TB_PROCESS_INSTANCE A , TB_TASK_RUN B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = B.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND A.STATUS = '재시작' AND B.TASK_STATUS != '정상종료' ) T WHERE 1 = 1 AND T.RN = 1
